status.info: We use this protocol in an introductory molecular cell biology laboratory and it’s working for us.

{"blocks":[{"key":"3f5em","text":"Microwave on HIGH for  ; the solution should begin to boil. Remove from the microwave and swirl.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6arm4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fc0h5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"g5h2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"da9o7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"850BEC40016111ED9F9BB5369151BDA7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7ph6f","text":"Be careful, it will be very hot! Use a folded-over paper towel and grab the flask at the top to avoid burning yourself.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"17bjh","text":"Look carefully at the contents of the flask while you swirl it. If there are any flecks of undissolved agarose remaining, microwave again for  . Repeat until the solution is completely clear.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":142,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dsbtm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b7v3i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54m63","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":15,"guid":"929F6AD0016111ED9F9BB5369151BDA7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2238m","text":" It should look as clear as water when you swirl it.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9j26s","text":"Set the agarose solution on the bench to cool slightly. While it is cooling, insert the black wedges and the gel comb into the gel box. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"55q6q","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c7e08","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"cnrj3","text":"Make sure the combs are on the side of the gel box near the black electrode.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1rmv4","text":"When the agarose solution is cool enough that you can hold your hand against it for 10 seconds, carefully pour the solution into the gel tray.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8eqi7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5j1p0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3l54t","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3rek","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"mcme","text":"It is particularly important that the agarose solution be cool enough, because if it isn't the gel box can be damaged.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1d2t","text":"If you would like to cool it faster, you can swirl the flask under running cold tap water. Don't let it solidify in the flask!","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"54jen","text":"Wait   for your gel to solidify.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"41qgp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8d1g4","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"46vic","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"7EF563E0016111ED9F9BB5369151BDA7","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ebe4q","text":"The gel should be solid and uniformly translucent.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"43hf2","text":"Carefully remove the gel combs and the black wedges.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8cls4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"k1jg","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8i2qn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3659a","text":"PAUSE POINT -- You can put your gel in a sandwich baggie with a splash of buffer and store it in the refrigerator for up to 48 hours. Longer than that and the DNA stain will degrade.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9jp46","text":"If you removed your gel from the gel box (or cast it outside of the gel box), put your gel in the box with the wells toward the black electrode.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1svv4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4nc72","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"arn7n","text":"Pour just enough 1X LAB buffer into the box to entirely submerge the gel.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1k76q","text":"Below, select whether you're analyzing a PCR or a restriction digest:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

If there aren't, the gel box may be assembled incorrectly or damaged.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"65qrp","text":"The LAB buffer allows us to run the gel at a higher voltage, and for a shorter time, than we would with a traditional buffer like TAE or TBE. However, this decreases the resolution somewhat. For a \"prettier\" gel, you can run for 30 minutes at 100 volts.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
